# Nutrition Tracker
A single page app that tracks the user's calorie intake.

#### Features
* Responsive design using Bootstrap
* Nutrition from Nutrionix API
* Recipes from Edamam API
* Charts from Google Charts API

## Documentation

* Generated by JSDoc `public/docs/jsdoc`
* Generated by Docco `public/docs/docco`

## Notes
#### Dependencies
* Bootstrap Theme: https://bootswatch.com/spacelab/
* Underscore
* Backbone
* Backbone.localStorage
* Backbone.Typeahead
* Handlebars

#### CSS
* Boostrap
* Nutrionix Label

#### API
* Nutritionix
* Edamam
* Google Charts

#### Fonts
* Archivo

#### Plugins
* eqHeights
